analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xd762e6906f0d96043a661b06f9430d3129186f41.sol#235-237) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xd762e6906f0d96043a661b06f9430d3129186f41.sol#237)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0xd762e6906f0d96043a661b06f9430d3129186f41.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/13/0xd762e6906f0d96043a661b06f9430d3129186f41.sol#1): it allows old versions
